hint.text: Rearrange the terms in the dividend and divisor in order of degree..

solution.text:
First rearrange the terms in the divisor in order of degree : \(2x^2+4x-3\)
Now perform long division as follows :

content.text: Divide the polynomial \(p(x)=8x^4-10x^2+30x-3\,\) by \(g(x)=2x^2-3+4x\). What is the remainder?
